title: Milking a cow at Lake Metroparks Farmpark.

tasks.task: Milk a dairy cow using both hand milking and a machine.
subtasks: Gather information about the cow's diet and watering needs.
Learn about the cow's milk production cycle and requirements.
Apply teat dip sanitizer on the cow's udder.
Remove excess teat dip after a brief waiting period.
Hand milk each quarter of the udder to check milk quality and udder condition.
Apply additional teat dip to the cow's teats.
Allow the teat dip to sit for the required time.
Remove teat dip from the cow's teats.
Prepare the machine milking setup, including attaching the claw.
Activate the machine to create suction for milk removal.
